title: Shekhar Home
overview: Set in 1990s Lonpur, Bengal, “Shekhar Home” combines suspense & comedy as eccentric Shekhar and his new housemate Jayavrat solve a variety of cases while interacting with a vibrant cast of characters in a charming, pre-technology era.

tv.episodeOverview: Shekhar dives into a village scam where a jungle adventure leads to a bank heist. With a bride-to-be's father missing, he uncovers a tangled plot revealing a cunning robber with a grudge, while the looming threat of "M" draws ever closer.
